EmailTemplate.name: Adhoc email
EmailTemplate.subject: Cuota anual
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British School of Navarra Part of The British Schools Foundation
Pamplona, 19th of June 2018
Dear families,
As we are finishing this academic year, we would appreciate it in case you are thinking of paying a single annual fee for the next year, please let us know before Monday the 25th of June.
Thank you very much
Laura González
---------------------------------------------------------------
Estimadas familias,
Como ya estamos finalizando este curso académico, les agradeceríamos que si están pensando en abonar una única cuota anual para el curso que viene, por favor nos lo hagan saber antes del lunes 25 de Junio.
Muchas gracias,
Laura González
